title: the game will collapse because of these people !
body:
it's really cool to see free skins and icons and all these sh*t, but in the first place, people are playing this game not for skins, but for fun ! how could we have fun while alot of asshol*s are trolling ! every single game 1 or even 2, they are't even bad players they are trolling in purpose of destroying the game! 
{{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}}

replies.body: I played ranked silver. I honestly don't see trolls, just bad players. I don't know how MMR is calculated but I'm in silver and I feel like I am above a lot of these players (I know biased but check my stats). If anything this game will die because of the bad match making.
Heard this before, game has not collapsed. Did you uninstall and ask Riot to close your account? Didnt think so.
